document_data.name: ''Ring of Energy Immunity''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''ring of energy immunity''''', or a '''''ring of elemental immunity''''', was a [[ring]] that, when worn, granted complete immunity to a single type of energy: [[acid]], cold, electricity, [[fire]], or sonic.
document_data.Description: These epic rings were essentially bands made of [[adamantine]], and had a market price of about 240,000 [[gp]].
document_data.Powers:
Whilst worn, these adamantine rings provided continual immunity to a single type of elemental energy.

In order to craft a ring of such power, a very skilled crafter and [[mage]] had to be able to cast ''[[protection from elements]]''.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Protanther]], the great [[gold]] [[wyrm]] had a ''ring of energy immunity (electricity)'' amongst his hoard

* [[Kimarr]] of [[Taydome's Keep]] in [[Thar]] owned a ''ring of electrical immunity''
